remarks: "Bamalip", one of the syllogisms of Aristotelian logic.  All ` ph ` is ` ps ` , all ` ps ` is ` ch ` , and ` ph ` exist, therefore some ` ch ` is ` ph ` .  (In Aristotelian notation, AAI-4:  PaM and MaS therefore SiP.) Like ~ barbari .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 28-Aug-2016.)
statement:
bamalip.maj $e |- A. x ( ph -> ps ) $.
bamalip.min $e |- A. x ( ps -> ch ) $.
bamalip.e $e |- E. x ph $.
bamalip $p |- E. x ( ch /\ ph ) $.
